level.heading: Applicability of chapter.
level.text: This chapter shall apply to an entity formed under or subject to this title.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Former ยง 29-101.03 has been recodified as ยง 29A-101.03.
